name: Prancer
description:
This is a game in which you control your own ball and eject another player's ball off the stage.

・ In online mode, the score will be added when you play the opponent. Compete for scores on the Leaderboard.

・In training mode, you can practice by setting the number of CPUs.

・ The game system is similar to .io games.

・Under development. I plan to add features and fix bugs in the future.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Movement: Mouse pointer tracking (overhead view)

                           WASD (TPS view)

Jump: space

Evasion: Left mouse click (can be reused after 3 seconds)

Switch perspective: right mouse click

Return to title screen: Esc

TPS view: -----------------------------

Move viewpoint: Mouse (wheel)

------------------------------------------

・Full screen is recommended for overhead view.

・When the mouse is out of the screen in the battle screen and you can't move the viewpoint well, click the mouse once in the screen.
